entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
